name: Dog and Rooster, Inc.
description:
We are a web design and development company teeming with talent, extended know-how and nearly two decades of solid experience. We produce and deliver user interfaces and web applications, no matter how complex the vision or idea. In fact, we encourage the impossible task.
From brand planning to multi-channel digital platforms, our advanced skill set spans the spectrum. We are the David with Goliath-sized web expertise, allowing us to work smarter and more efficiently than our competitors.
